author: legoman4694
title: i remember this
review:
i went to the store with my little brother along time ago. we were going to buy lego racers (they were very new back then) me and him both got this set. its good. we each got it for $10 and that is the price of hot scorcher alone. i got red bullet free. 

so heres the review.

Hot scorcher-this racer is like a formula 1 car. its got a sleed design and nice brite colors. the figure is also cool. he isnt small and his head is a ninjas head. it came with lots of yellow and orange pieces and apull back motor. the moter didnt go very fast but it went very far.
10/10

red bullet-this racer is small and has one of those mini-bodys. i thought the face was silly and the car was cool though. it came with some extra pieces to build other cars shown on the manuel. the moter didnt go very far though. 9/10

its a good set even if you just want hot scorcher because you get free pieces. 9.5/10
